item.description:
Now familiar to local dance fans through its annual Bushnell seasons, Connecticut Ballet makes its first Riverfront appearance with a lively mixed bill, including an exciting classical opener, Brett Raphael?s ?Upside Down, Right Side Up? and a medley of Bob Fosse hits. Don?t miss it!

Rain Date: August 24

Location: Mortensen Riverfront Plaza

Food Vending Opportunities:
Riverfront Recapture programs a variety of concerts, festivals, and sporting events that include food vending. All food and beverage vendors are required to complete an application and receive approval from Riverfront Recapture. To receive an application,
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give my Number a couple days before.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!
